author: spencer_tb
content:
**ðŸ§ª EEST full release v5.0.0:** https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/v5.0.0

- `fixtures_stable.tar.gz` contains tests filled for forks until Prague, including `GeneralStateTests`  from `ethereum/tests`.
- `fixtures_develop.tar.gz` contains tests filled for forks until Osaka, including `GeneralStateTests`  from `ethereum/tests`.
  - Note: the refilled `GeneralStateTests`  from `ethereum/tests` are filled only from Cancun.

**Please read release notes!** They contain important information on the current status quo for EL tests and our future plans to merge the EEST repo with EELS - "the weld".

As always, if there are any questions or comments, please create a thread here!
